name: Theresa Vanduzer
text: Love Cotton Posh! Great selection and affordable clothing. Easy online checkout with extremely fast shipping. I will continue to shop here for myself, my teenager and toddler!

resp.text: Thank you Theresa! We appreciate your patronage.

name: Mary Jane Rose
text: The owners are the sweetest! I told them the colors I was looking for and before I knew it I was wanting to buy just about the whole store!! I’m so excited for my new clothes and would recommend this store to anyone looking for clothes for a nice night out, or just a cute casual look. Definitely one of my new go-to’s!!!

resp.text: Thank you Mary Jane! We appreciate your business! Come back soon!

name: Jane Sonak
text: I love this store!  There's so many different sizes and options.  The ladies here are super nice!

name: Jennifer Oliver
text: Love the sweet owner and her selection of clothes!

name: Tonya Rooks
text: I love this place!!!

name: Mark Hutchison
text:
My wife surprised me by taking me to the store for my birthday.

What a great selection of shirts and other clothing.

Charles and his staff did an excellent job.

A must Vis when traveling though Tuscaloosa.

Thanks again

resp.text: Thank you for your business and your kind review! We hope to see you soon!

name: Shelby Lamkin
text: HORRIBLE!! The owner is SO RUDE! Follows you around the store like you are stealing, stares at you the entire time, and makes you feel like you aren’t good enough to even be in there. I’ve been there 3 times and always had the same feeling. The owner even insulted one of my family members for the way he was dressed! I refuse to go there ever again or spend any money in there, and I will be sure to spread the word on how they run their business!

resp.text: We are sorry we made you feel uncomfortable. This was not our intention. We try to be attentive  to and create conversation with every customer.  We would love to talk to you about your experience - (205) 752-6931.

name: J Parker Rhodes
text: Never shopping here again.  One of my sales reps reached out to see if they would be interested in us sending them a holiday sample box. She was treated absolutely terrible.  There exact words were: "It's the holidays, if your line was good enough to be in our store it would be by now".   That's the kind of attitude that gets you left in the dust.

name: Ryan Grant
text: Got a hat from here, there was a small issue with it and the helpful staff sent me a replacement very promptly. Great customer service.

name: James Cain
text:
The best of the best!  A Tuscsaloosa tradition for over 40 years.  Suits and sports coats expertly fitted with service and expertise that you simply can’t find anymore.  Quality is the best you can find.  I am still wearing suits that I bought there 15 years ago!   The owner has an eye for the next big thing in fashion. And he brings it to Tuscaloosa before you can find it anywhere else.
Your new shirt will be steamed while you wait so it’s ready to wear for that big occasion.  Your pants and jacket will be fitted and altered to give you that custom made look.
If you want the best service and best selection, go to The Shirt Shop, a Tuscaloosa icon.

name: Sabrina Steuber
text: I have only visited your store once when I visited Tuscaloosa and my experience was a positive one, I truly love all the game day shirts! I am an online shopper and always end up purchasing your Comfort Colors elephant shirts/tank tops. Shipping is very fast and great quality as usual! Love this store. Roll Tide!

name: Cristine Kuo
text: I absolutely love this store! I usually order online since I live in Tennessee, but whenever I order their merchandise it ships promptly and the customer service is great. I absolutely LOVE their rival t-shirts. It’s my favorite and I have been ordering all of them for the past several years! Thanks again for making these great shirts!

name: Logan Newsome
text: Shopped here on the Saturday before Christmas and although I don’t usually leave reviews I was impressed with this stores service and quality of their products. The staff was very friendly and helpful in finding just the right items for my needs. You will never find this level of service, nor the quality in the big box stores. Thank you Shirt Shop for assisting me in purchasing the best Christmas gifts! I will definitely return.

name: Jeremy Hudson
text: The staff here is what makes this place the best. I’ve never met people who were so into providing the best customer service experience around. I got a size too large in a jacket once and I had to exchange it. Not only did Bethany go find jackets in my size but elected not to charge me the difference in price. I always get the help and knowledge of the products in store to assure I’ve got the right size in my hand at checkout! Not only that, but they are quick to respond to my Instagram messages, and send me products!

name: Tanner Corley
text: they have great staff. helpful in every way possible. very friendly also. if you’re in tuscaloosa stop by and check them out

name: Ashlyn Pounders
text: I love the Shirt Shop! Great products and even better customer service! Highly recommend :)

name: Alan Ruth
text: A great store and Charles will definitely take care of you. Visiting from CO and they were very accommodating as we arrived right before closing. They helped my daughter find what she had been looking for. Thank you! Great service!!!

name: Kyle Jernigan
text: See. Leck. Shun.  Selection.  And service.  That's the 2 things I always find at this place. Yes, there is a ton of inventory but that's because they have 100 different options from which to choose - just when picking out a button up shirt. It's the same for slacks or a suit, they have every option you can imagine or have seen online. They don't have " just blue and white" button downs, they have every possible style/color/pattern which is awesome. It's almost hard to make a decision but they help you narrow it down to what you really like. They greet you when you walk in and help you find what you want and they don't show you something you may not like. And then they make sure it fits. Imagine having someone show you around, help you find just what you like, and then making sure it fits you just right. It's one of the finer things you can enjoy.

name: Stacey Lynch
text: This place would be decent if there wasn’t so much stuff shoved in one tiny place.

name: Trey Bagnardi
text: This place was not worth my time. I thought it would be super helpful and I would be able to find what I wanted, but I could not find anything. The shirts also smell really bad.

name: Scott Ward
text: They treated me with respect and were very helpful in finding an item that was right for me not just a sale

name: Wendy Sherrod
text: Wanted to buy something for Christmas, but the website was just too complicated. I recommend moving to a new website builder.

name: Liz Dickenson
text: Great, fun store. I enjoy the experience completely, and highly recommend it to my friends traveling thru T-town. The Spurlins are a local treasure. I always stop in on my way thru. Great merchandise and I always find something I need!

name: Michael Sadowski
text: Friendly staff, nice clothes

name: jason burson
text: Great selection and the customer service is always fantastic, I can’t wait to go back

name: Sara Jones
text: This store has a lot of potential, just needs a better eye for fashion and possibly a nice cleaning:)))

name: Thomas Rice
text: Been shopping at the Shirt Shop since I was a student at BAMA. One of the absolute best places to get good clothes!

name: Emily Johnson
text: The Shirt Shop is the best of the best! The best customer service and for sure the best products!

name: Chip Gentry
text: I visited in June '15. Greeted with a genuine southern hospitality I would have expected nothing less.  The stores staff is amazingly well versed on clothing trends, styles and fittings. With a passive soft selling techniques.  True haberdasher experience.

name: John Smith
text: Beware... !!!Rude owner.. Disrespectful.. Will never go back.. Downright Nasty Man...

name: David Martin
text: Love the clothes here. Unique and trendy. Best service in Tuscaloosa for men's retail clothing. A must stop for any Tuscaloosa visit.

name: Tatianna Mondaini
text: First time visiting this store today with my family in town for Easter, and the staff followed us around the store acting like we were going to steal something. When we left after looking around, one of the staff members followed us outside to see what we were doing/if we had stolen something. I won't be visiting again, and I do not like to feel like I'm being watched when I'm shopping and I'm genuinely just looking around.

name: Lindsay Meacham
text: Love The Shirt Shop! Mr. Spurlin and his staff are always very helpful and friendly and the selection of clothing is endless! Whether you are looking for Alabama game day apparel or just classy, traditional style clothing they have everything you need!

name: Josh Smitherins
text: 5 out of 5. Not too much experience with this place, but the few times I have been it has been good. I purchased a high dollar pair of sunglasses from here.  I ended up having an allergic reaction to the nose pads.  I took them back to the store a week later and they had no problem exchanging them for another pair.  Service is always friendly with somebody always asking if you need help when walking in (but not in a pushy kind of way).

name: Cory McGuffie
text: I have shopped here for many years. Now that I live out of town I still make special trips to come back and shop at the Shirt Shop!!!

name: Wendy Smith
text: Customer service was excellent , even with a store full of shoppers.  Great selection and quality.

name: S. B.
text: I went to this store over many years after graduating from Alabama buying $1000's worth of merchandise in the past.  This past year I picked a Peter Millar Windbreaker that Charles Spurlin the owner personally said he would get monogrammed for me, I paid for the windbreaker and the monogram and left expecting to pick up in a week.  I live out of town and made a special trip back to pick up the next week.  On arrival Charles notified me that the logo was printed upside down (duh!) and that he would get another one and have it done with either the retro Alabama logo or get a new windbreaker.  I returned for the third time and he told me it wasn't done and that he would refund my purchase price.  Well Charles you cost me three private trips to your store, endless aggravation of incompetence and not receiving the windbreaker that I chose and paid for.   My time is valuable so we are not "square".  What is even worse, I gave you my number and you said you would call me to let me know what could be done.  Needless to say, I heard nothing.

name: Ted Turner
text: Best shirts in T-Town..Charles, the owner is a great man to know.. he will treat you right.

name: Jin Zhao
text: Bought some Roll Tide caps. Nice place.

name: Carly Mullady Cowan
text:
I've ordered online several times and was very excited to bring my upcoming freshman brother to the shop, which carries many items we *would* have been interested in purchasing. I almost purchased groomsman shirts from them last fall and am so relieved I didn't. I will not so much as order online ever again. I'm in my 30s and was well dressed aside from a necessary Columbia rain jacket and was joined by my mother and younger brother. When you walk in, it feels like an episode of Hoarders. Everything is everywhere. Stacks. Piles. Overstuffed racks. No sense of organization. It feels like an overstocked Goodwill with name brand stickers strewn about. Prices may or may not be on items. Seeing how poorly $80+ shirts are kept in the store is a definite turnoff.
Even less settling however, was being followed by the staff as if I was going to stuff their items in my small Kate Spade crossbody bag. Should the three of us separate in the tiny shop, there'd be a person on each of us at the snap of a finger--and this is after I found a staff member's cell phone in a pile of clothes and turned it in to them. As we perused, I heard them complaining "OH. THAT is why they're here. Orientation."
That's when I rounded up the crew and we visited different stores with organization, fantastic selections, and genuinely kind staff.
Save yourself frustration, a headache, and money. Skip this stop.

name: Shelby Shaw
text: I love that I can always find the hottest trends! Glad to have a store like this in Bama!

name: Philip Huff
text: The best service I've ever had from a clothing store!!  Thanks Charles! RTR

name: Scott Shepherd
text: I had a great experience at the Shirt Shop. The staff was very helpful and patient. Thanks for the shirt and belt!

name: Grayson “Geekbot97”
text: Best customer service I've ever had.

name: Jesseca Smith
text: One of the employee's was really rude to me when I asked for her assistance. I asked her a question about a gift certificate I purchased the night before for the store and she told me they would not honor it because they were not participating in the site anymore. That is bad customer service, I work in retail and that was not the proper procedure if I had the certificate present with me as well as made a payment of $50 already. I will not step foot in the Shirt Shop ever again and that is a promise.

name: Mary Grace Scott
text: Terrible customer service. Will not be back.

name: Ben Carithers
text: Great clothing....it's worth checking out!

name: stas chernyshov
text: Terrible experience won’t be coming back

name: Ross U
text: Great clothing store in Tuscaloosa with their own elephant logo.

name: Jacob Harel
text: Terrible prices for generic clothing.

name: Jonah C
text: Messy, poor customer service, smells bad, disrespectful

name: J Frost
text: Good stuff but HIGH prices

name: Princess Pamela
text: Stuck up staff! Expensive!

name: Sonya McCollum
text: Jennifer, my sales rep was so sweet. I will highly recommend her.

name: Michael Alexander
text: Great staff and great clothes

name: Rodney Burnes
text: Great place to shop! Very friendly staff and very helpful!

name: Charles Henry Hall.
text: Another great place to buy clothes.

name: Orlando Gilstrap
text: Very nice clothes ,I shop here alot

name: A
text: Buckle does not stand behind their jeans. They come apart at the seams on the pockets and they refuse to make them up, so far my son has had 3 to come apart. They offered to repair & made a royal mess with a bright teal iron on patch which you could see through the hole. Other jeans are much better quality. Also their staff hover over you like vulchers.

name: Holly Grinstead
text: I shop at this location all the time an never had a issue til the other day. I went in to look at kids clothes an a lady came up an ask if I needed help. I said no but she remained standing behind us. She was so close she made me an my son uncomfortable. I asked her if she needed something an she said no. I asked her then could she back up. She said she had to stand there an took one step back. I know that’s not policy because I have a relative that worked there. We left. I will not return to this location as long as she’s there

name: John Riendeau
text: Always has my Sullen shirts

name: Cassandra Griffin
text:
Paul and Kimberly (hope the names are correct) were amazing! I walked in looking for an interview outfit. I walked out with the top and shoes that I needed!
They were very friendly and knew exactly how to help!
I'll definitely be back with my boyfriend and we'll both update our wardrobes!

(Store # 324)

name: mary taylor
text: Friendly helpful staff

name: lane unruh
text: Very pleasant. Couldn't ask for better assistance

name: Kathleen Johnston
text: Great staff - friendly, engaged, accommodating, and very charming. Treated me like a queen. Even carried my bags out. They know how to treat customers. Thanks so much! I will be back!

name: Kathy Clark
text: It was great custmer service. The lady was very help full in finding what I needed.It was Sunday June 9th around 4.40pn.

name: Vanessa Brown
text: They must have fired the employee that was referred to on someone's previous post because I had excellent service as did two young black girls that were in the store at the same time as me. Their clothing is expensive but so worth it. Their jeans never wear out or loose shape!

name: Edward Richardson
text: The sales team did a great job of finding the special order pants that I needed. They were super friendly and super helpful

name: J D
text: Nice store, helpful employees. WAAAAAY to expensive, but that is Buckle!

name: Jud Cameron
text: Great customer service!

name: Tony Polion
text: Best customer experiences I have had in years

name: magy Rico
text: Good things

name: Pamela Barger
text: I Love Buckle!! The employees are.NICE!! They are NOT MEAN OR RACISTS!!!!

name: King Craig
text: Treated me like trash!! Racist white people workn there!!! Negative ten stars!! Telling every person I know not to shop there!!

name: Stacy Halverson
text: Too high

name: Sandra down home blues Judge
text: Awesome

name: Forrest Loney
text: My favorite store

name: Jeff Kizziah
text: Great people and place

name: Brittany Watts
text: We went here today to do the dreaded Jean shopping, only this time it wasn’t a dreadful experience at all!! Thanks too Jay & Bailey this was by far the best shopping experience I’ve had in Montgomery, they knew what they were talking about, they were able to help me find the perfect fitting jeans and even give me advice on other brands I may like that were like the ones I fell in love with, they were also amazing with my daughter letting her help them pick things out and carrying on conversations with her, I could go on about how amazing this place and the employees there are, but you should definitely go check it out yourself, especially if you’re in the market for the most comfortable jeans you’ll ever slip into ❤️ Thanks Jay and Bailey for all your help, and thanks buckle for having jeans for even us curvier girls!

name: Yolanda W.
text: The guy that waited on us was super nice!

name: kyle simmons
text: I had an Awesome  experience  at Buckle last Saturday  night. Real knowledgeable young lady. Definitely  will be back. Thanks again Abigail😀

name: Becks Lee
text: I like coming here when I'm in the area, but it's generally overpriced and doesn't have many deals. Also, I appreciate the friendly staff, but It gets uncomfortable when I've expressed more than once that I don't need assistance and having to say no thank you to a pair of jeans, a hat, and shoes while browsing and even up to the register.

name: Kelly Gambrel
text: Leanna was so helpful!

name: Vicki Langham
text: Excellent service as always

name: Alvaro Ochoa
text: Best attitudes in Town's Business

name: Vernon Hunter
text: Great staff and good phone service. Brought back a pair of shoes and Jay really helped a lot. Went out of his way showing us what they had. We'll be back.

name: Keisha Graves
text: Love Keionna! She's the best!

name: Sandra down home blues Judge
text: Very pleasant and my assistance  Shaquita,  was very helpful and polite

name: Leo Lewis Jr
text: Staff was friendly and made me feel welcomed

name: Jackie Richey
text: Beautiful trendy clothes!!! Great staff!! Friendly, helpful and knowledgeable...

name: Dalton Roberson
text: Nice place just a little pricey and limited selection.

name: Sash hsaS
text: Customer service really good and lots of stuff to choose from.

name: Victoria King
text: Found some cute booties.

name: pamela griffin
text: Love this store. Always  friendly and very helpful.

name: denise rasnek
text: Their sales associates are amazing!!

name: Vanessa Brown
text: Amazing clothes that last forever. They are expensive but you get what you're paying for here!

name: Derek Price
text: Nice and clean and fast

name: Kim Lee
text: Super friendly

name: Eddie Langford
text: Great store for clothes

name: Ella R. Brown
text: Never been there

name: sainadh vennapusala
text: Loved the place

name: Breanna Drake
text: My daughters went into this store today. They are 16 years old. The manager stopped them and accused them of stealing a $3.99 ring. She asked if they could search them and go figure they didn’t find anything!! Let me tell you something my kids do not have to steal nothing! Next time you go to search a minor you better have law enforcement or security there and you better pull video before you falsely accuse a minor. Do you know how embarrassing that is !! This manager got an ear full today and has not heard the last from this parent! I am calling my lawyer to find out what can be done about searching a minor without law enforcement around or contacting a parent!!

name: Samantha Drake
text: They really accused me of stealing when I was holding my friends jewelry while she was in the dressing room. They went through all my bags in front  of everyone and embarrassed me, and go figure they found nothing! Need I mention my friend literally showed her the jewelry I was holding for her and she still went through my bags. This was so wrong of them!!!

name: Phyllis Rembert
text: My niece loves this store, when I say love I mean love. If only you could see her closet. Aeropostale jeans, sweat suits, shirts. She loves this store.😍

name: Robert Wendling
text: Buy one get one free t-shirts, $30 for one, $10 a piece, not bad for Aeropostale.

name: Nina Smith
text:
Fast , friendly service
Took back some returns and despite it being busy I was in and out

name: Noretta Greene Nanny's Babies Nursery
text: Cute clothes and plenty of school uniforms!

name: lisa schreiner
text: Store was clean but they will get u on the sales so be careful

name: Cynthia Hutchinson
text: Tight store to walk in but its worth it for the cheap low cost on clothes

name: Saulat Ahmad
text: Racists and dont help they are rude to there colored employess by the look of it. I am asian. Came back to return somthing one of the girl was doing my return and everything was going fine until the short white guy came early 20s o guys and kept rolling his eyes and kept asking sure i dont wanna exchange and everytime i said no thanks he kept making rude faces. Worst customers service ever will never come back. The deal was good 3 shirts for 30 but my husband only liked one so i just had to return. Alll but i was treated like a i did a crime.

name: Front Desk
text: I would give no stars but it is not allowed. I just received the worst customer service ever from a young caucasisn manager with black hair and bumps all in her face and glasses and a young Caucasian boy with rwd bumos all in his face. The boy was my cashier and he was giving cash cards out to white customers only. When U asked for one, he gave me the worst stare. I have never been treated so ugly! I will never shop in that store again.

name: assilem
text: Not to happy having tI drive forty minutes back another day to have the security tags taken off. Then to be treated like we stole something. I had my receipt in my bag. Very very rude the day I returned on July 8th.

name: Robert Knight
text: Best clothes ever

name: DewN Nitek
text: The Bel Air Mall location has consistently been a great shopping environment. Too bad it will be closed by the end of the quarter.

name: Jovan Harris
text: My child love this store

name: Frank Haviland
text: Never been in there

name: Jo Kincaid
text: Loved it

name: Debra Colbert
text: To expensive

name: Vietlao
text: Was a bit messy when I went in

name: Debra Colbert
text: To expensive

name: Jo Kincaid
text: Loved it
